1.0.name: wordpress/dachat
1.0.description:
This plugin adds a new widget in your admin dashboard that let's users type messages to each other. If you have used any instant messages client before, this should be familiar already.

Tested and works fine in IE7, IE8, Safari+Chrome, FireFox, Opera & Camino. Works with a few minor bugs in IE6.

Read more about the plugin at the Mr. Henry blog - http://blog.mrhenry.be/2010/01/a-call-for-help/
